definitions.definition: the sport or pastime of riding a wave toward the shore while standing or lying on a surfboard.
stand or lie on a surfboard and ride on a wave toward the shore.
ride (a wave) toward the shore on a surfboard.
examples: he has built a career out of surfing big waves

definitions.definition: ride on the roof or outside of a fast-moving vehicle, typically a train, for excitement.
examples: he fell to his death while surfing on a 70 mph train

definitions.definition: move from site to site on (the Internet).
